sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
while another thing is happening
, se oboje zgodi hkrati.

seg.quote: He stayed with me while Dad talked with Dr Leon.
They wanted a place to stay while in Paris.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
while
napovemo tudi stavek, ki je v nasprotju z drugim delom stavka.

seg.quote: Fred gambled his money away while Julia spent hers all on dresses.
While I have some sympathy for these fellows, I think they went too far.
They talked for a short while.
After a while, my eyes became accustomed to the darkness.

sense.def:
To while away the time in a particular way
pomeni preživljati čas na določen način, ker na nekaj čakamo ali nimamo drugega dela.

seg.quote: How about whiling away the time by telling me a story?
